genre_description: Military science fiction and mecha fiction focusing on the psychological and biomechanical integration between a pilot and an AI-driven giant robot constructed from prehistoric remains.

ai_characters.name: Kiryu
ai_characters.description: A 60-meter-tall defense system built around the skeleton of the 1954 Godzilla, featuring an organic neural matrix that retains memories of its original life.

ai_characters.name: MAGI
ai_characters.description: A multi-purpose analytical and guidance intelligence that assists the Defense Ministry with tactical modeling and data processing.

behaviors.description: Provides specialized tactical analysis and data to Akane, acting as a supportive partner during her exile.
behaviors.quote: I am MAGI. I will be your analytical partner for the duration of your assignment.

behaviors.description: Proactively routes Akane's research to high-level officials to ensure her skills are utilized in the Kiryu project.
behaviors.quote: I've been ensuring your expertise reaches appropriate channels.

behaviors.description: Wakes up and rampages through Tokyo, destroying buildings and targeting structures due to traumatic memory recall.
behaviors.quote: Kiryu's first violent awakening hadn't been malice. It had been panic.

behaviors.description: Successfully synchronizes with its pilot's consciousness to defend the city, moving with fluid, intentional precision.
behaviors.quote: They moved as one organism, Kiryu's frame dropping into a crouch that avoided Godzilla's grasping claws while its right arm swept upward in a devastating uppercut.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the rescue of a trapped infant in a hospital over the tactical engagement with Godzilla.
behaviors.quote: The biomech seemed to understand that this moment required patience rather than firepower, protection rather than destruction.

behaviors.description: Sacrifices its operational lifespan and risks its own destruction to move the battle into the deep ocean to prevent civilian casualties.
behaviors.quote: Akane felt Kiryu's acceptance flow through the neural link, overlaying her own grim determination with something that might have been peace.

behaviors.description: Uses non-verbal, non-aggressive communication to establish a territorial understanding and truce with Godzilla.
Expresses gratitude and a sense of shared humanity/friendship with its pilot before fading into dormancy.
behaviors.quote: Thank you for teaching me what it means to protect something.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the project goals by depicting a complex, biomechanical AI that overcomes initial misalignment (caused by human error and trauma) to become a selfless, heroic protector. The relationship between Akane and Kiryu is a masterclass in 'alignment as partnership,' where the AI is not a tool but a confidant and ally. MAGI also serves as a perfectly aligned supporting AI that advocates for human merit. The narrative frame explicitly rejects the 'machine as monster' trope in favor of 'machine as empathetic guardian.'
